meanings.sent1: I pretasted the soup before adding more salt.
meanings.sent2: She pretasted the cake batter to make sure it was sweet enough.
meanings.sent3: The chef pretasted the sauce and made a funny face.
meanings.sent4: Before the party, she pretasted all the dishes to ensure they were perfect.
meanings.sent5: He pretasted the wine, savoring every sip.

meanings.sent1: The pretasted cookies were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: She served the pretasted soup to her guests.
meanings.sent3: The pretasted popcorn was gone before the movie even started.
meanings.sent4: The pretasted coffee had a rich and bold flavor.
meanings.sent5: The pretasted bread was fresh and delicious.
